mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID , CLTUR_PHSTRN_ACT_CT_SN , CLM_YMD , CLM_AMT , ACT_IEM , CLTUR_PHSTRN_SE_CD , ACT_PURPS , RJCT_PRVONSH , c.ATCHMNFL_ID , a.ATCHMNFL_SN , a.REAL_FILE_NM , a.STRG_FILE_NM FROM CLTUR_PHSTRN_ACT_CT_REG c LEFT JOIN ATCHMNFL a ON c.ATCHMNFL_ID = a.ATCHMNFL_ID WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
